ovdesc.p: Used to capture T24 SECURITY.POSITION's and SWIFT statement of holdings for reconciliation against each other. Data will either be populated directly from an incoming SWIFT message or may be manually input.

desc.p: Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Used to identify the holding as a T24 position ('P') or a depository statement position ('S').
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Displays the sub account.

The key of the record. A multi-part id, seperated by dots, each part of which is repeated in fields 1 to 5. Consists of the depository code, sub account (if any), security code, indicator (P or S) and date.
The status's of the record, will show all history of the matching process.
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Displays the security code and enrichment from the SECURITY.MASTER application.
The statement page number. Will either be extracted from the SWIFT message or input manually.
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Extracted from the SECURITY.MASTER application.
Further identification. Will either be extracted from the SWIFT message or input manually.
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. This field displays the depositories reference for the sub account. Extracted from the CUSTOMER.SECURITY application.
This is the message type that was sent from the depository in response to our request.
The statement basis. Will either be extracted from the SWIFT message or input manually.
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Displays the statement period.
Must be a valid T24 date.
The holding quantity. Will either be extracted from the SWIFT message or input manually.
The key to the matching record. Can be either automatically allocated by the automatic matching process or manually input.
Once authorised it may not be changed.
Shows as 'YES' when the record is authorised with the MATCHED.TO field was populated

A non-input field which shows the authoriser id. This field is updated to 'SY_SR.AUTOMATCH.MT571' when the record is matched , after the SR.AUTOMATCH.MT571 is verified and matches a record on the SR.HOLDINGS file.
Shows the date on which the record was authorised with the MATCHED.TO field was populated
Defaulted from the key id of the SR.HOLDINGS record. Displays the ID and enrichment from the CUSTOMER.SECURITY file for the record.
